query:
SELECT mc.*, r.name as region_name, r.code as region_code, u.name as user_name, u.email as user_email
FROM monitoring_configs mc 
LEFT JOIN regions r ON mc.region_id = r.id 
LEFT JOIN users u ON mc.user_id = u.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT mc.*, r.name as region_name, r.code as region_code, u.name as user_name, u.email as user_email
FROM monitoring_configs mc 
LEFT JOIN regions r ON mc.region_id = r.id 
LEFT JOIN users u ON mc.user_id = u.id;
